No. of sessions from a direct source. The direct source refers to the traffic that comes to the website directly by typing the website name.
No. of sessions from a search source. Search source that comes from different search engines like Google, Yahoo, etc.
No. of sessions from a referring source. The referral source is traffic that comes from various websites and other channels.
No. of Sessions from a social source. The social source is traffic that comes from Social media channels or social media links.
No. of sessions from an email source. Email source is traffic that comes from Email campaign response.
No. of sessions from an SMS source. SMS source is traffic that comes from SMS campaign response.
No. of sessions from a Paid source. Paid Source is the traffic originating from channels like search engines or social media platforms generated via AdWords and Adsense.
